content:
Who am I

Welcome to my blog, I am Louis Aeilot
Born in 2007, enjoys coding, proud to be an amateur in photography and film making.

Check out the full description here.

Open Source

Glad to introduce a ton of creative open source projects to you:

  • How To Use Search Engines A simple tutorial to Search Engines.
  • Daily Notes A Markdown Note Application written for Android.

Dev Gears

  • Hardware: iMac 21.5
  • OS: macOS 12
  • Editor: VS Code + Android Studio + XCode
  • Terminal: iTerm2
  • Browser: Safari
  • VM: VMWare Fusion
  • KeyMap: Vim
